content:
Tomoyuki Suzuki is a research scientist at CyberAgent, Inc. and a Ph.D student at Keio University.
He engages himself in research on computer vision and machine learning. In my free time, I drink with my precious people, get inside the world of books, or travel around the world with my green backpack.
 Interests  Research :
He is generally interested in computer vision and machine learning. Especially, video understanding, multimodal learning, generative modeling. Application :
Entertainment, Creative/Design.  Education   Ph.D. student in Computer Science (2021.10 - present)
Keio University, Aoki lab. Adviser：Prof. Yoshimitsu Aoki
  M.S. in Computer Science and Electronic Engineering (2017.4 - 2019.3)
Keio University, Aoki lab. Adviser：Prof. Yoshimitsu Aoki
  B.S. in Electronics and Electrical Engineering (2013.4 - 2017.3)
Keio University, Aoki lab. Adviser：Prof. Yoshimitsu Aoki
  Ichikawa High School (2010.4 - 2013.3)

title: Tomoyuki Suzuki
